page.title: 02HOME LIFE -ONE
page.content: In a questionnaire that we delivered to houses in our area we asked certain questions about peoples home life. Concerning the use of telephones of those who replied nearly two-thirds have one telephone.One-sixth of houses in our area still have no telephone.There are just a few houses with more than one telephone.We found out that there were more colour televisions in homes than black and white but it was a suprise to us between the number of b/w T.V.s compared to colour.The reason for this is that we think that most people have more than one T.V. in the house.The extra T.V. is usually a black and white portable, the T.V. being colour and it would be located in main family room of the house .
